entries.a9936ddef7d6a378: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "The translation is highly accurate, preserving the original meaning and simile perfectly. The Vietnamese phrasing is natural and clear."}
entries.04c07b4409013a13: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "This translation is excellent, accurately conveying the meaning of the Pali text and maintaining natural Vietnamese fluency."}
entries.284727a524c2c77b: {"accuracy": 1, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "There are major errors in meaning. 'ajini ma\u1e43' (defeated me) is mistranslated as 'n\u00f3i \u0111i\u1ec1u kh\u00f4ng \u0111\u00fang v\u1ec1 ta' (said untrue things about me). 'ah\u0101si me' (robbed me) is omitted. 'vera\u1e43 tesa\u1e43 na sammati' (their hatred does not cease) is mistranslated as 'l\u00f2ng gh\u00e9t b\u1ecf c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd s\u1ebd kh\u00f4ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn' (their hatred will not be accepted)."}
entries.71886c177652fb5f: {"accuracy": 1, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "Similar to item 3, this translation contains major errors. 'ajini ma\u1e43' is again mistranslated, 'ah\u0101si me' is omitted. 'n\u016bpanayhanti' (do not bear a grudge) is not captured, and 'vera\u1e43 tes\u016bpasammati' (their hatred ceases) is mistranslated as 'l\u00f2ng gh\u00e9t b\u1ecf c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn' (their hatred will be accepted)."}
entries.1bb706188316c22f: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "The translation is perfectly accurate, capturing the essence of the Pali verse. The Vietnamese is natural, concise, and impactful."}
entries.63fcab6e195f358c: {"accuracy": 1, "fluency": 2, "explanation": "This translation has major accuracy issues. 'mayamettha yam\u0101mase' (we here shall perish) is completely misinterpreted as 'ta kh\u00f4ng mong h\u1ecd hi\u1ec3u' (I don't expect them to understand). 'medhag\u0101' (quarrels/disputes) is mistranslated as 'tr\u00ed tu\u1ec7' (wisdom), fundamentally altering the message about the cessation of disputes."}
entries.5f81185cccedb1f6: {"accuracy": 2, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "There's a major error in the first phrase: 'Subh\u0101nupassi\u1e43 viharanta\u1e43' (dwelling contemplating the beautiful/pleasant) is incorrectly translated as 'kh\u00f4ng qu\u00e1n t\u01b0\u1edfng s\u1ef1 x\u1ea5u' (not contemplating the ugly), which inverts the meaning. The rest is generally accurate."}
entries.b413e7791070f609: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "This translation is highly accurate, correctly interpreting all phrases, including 'Asubh\u0101nupassi\u1e43 viharanta\u1e43'. The Vietnamese is fluent and natural."}
entries.3a9b242e766d02b5: {"accuracy": 3, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "The translation misses a key concept: 'dama' (self-restraint) is omitted from 'damasaccena'. 'Anikkas\u0101vo' (without stain/impurity) is translated as 'kh\u00f4ng c\u00f3 gi\u1edbi lu\u1eadt' (without precepts), which is related but less precise than 't\u00e2m ch\u01b0a r\u1eddi u\u1ebf tr\u01b0\u1ee3c' (mind not free from defilements)."}
entries.d4f62190b2c12219: {"accuracy": 2, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "This translation has significant errors. 'vantakas\u0101vassa' (one who has spit out defilements) is loosely translated as 's\u1ed1ng ph\u1ea1m h\u1ea1nh' (lives a holy life). More critically, 'dama' (self-restraint) from 'damasaccena' is mistranslated as 't\u1ef1 tinh t\u1ea5n' (self-diligence), and 'sacca' (truth) is omitted entirely."}
entries.72c017f84554dc33: {"accuracy": 1, "fluency": 1, "explanation": "This translation is fundamentally flawed. The first two phrases 'As\u0101re s\u0101ramatino, s\u0101re c\u0101s\u0101radassino' (perceiving essence in the non-essential, and non-essence in the essential) are completely misinterpreted and inverted, leading to contradictory and nonsensical phrasing like 'Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi kh\u00f4ng hi\u1ec3u r\u00f5 s\u1ef1 th\u1eadt, nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi hi\u1ec3u r\u00f5 s\u1ef1 th\u1eadt'."}
entries.6075ae4c5a519d79: {"accuracy": 1, "fluency": 1, "explanation": "Similar to item 11, this translation suffers from major misinterpretations. The phrase 'as\u0101ra\u00f1ca as\u0101rato' (knowing the non-essential as non-essential) is mistranslated as 'v\u00e0 kh\u00f4ng hi\u1ec3u r\u00f5 s\u1ef1 th\u1eadt' (and don't understand the truth), creating a contradictory and meaningless statement in the first line."}
entries.5f003148347d8086: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "The translation is perfectly accurate, capturing the simile and its application to the mind and passion with excellent fluency."}
entries.2e3fd47e58a8a3c6: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "This translation is highly accurate, effectively conveying the meaning of the Pali text and maintaining natural Vietnamese phrasing."}
entries.bf73d97728e1fbb5: {"accuracy": 4, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "The translation is largely accurate. 'socati' (grieves/sorrows) is translated as '\u0111au kh\u1ed5' (suffers), which is a good equivalent. 'viha\u00f1\u00f1ati' (tormented) as 'tuy\u1ec7t v\u1ecdng' (desperate) is a strong interpretation but acceptable. 'kammakili\u1e6d\u1e6dhamattano' (his own defiled action) as 'qu\u1ea3 b\u00e1o c\u1ee7a ch\u00ednh m\u00ecnh' (his own retribution) is a reasonable inference."}
entries.b942857f5b998959: {"accuracy": 4, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "The translation is mostly accurate. 'modati' (rejoices) as 'vui'/'vui s\u01b0\u1edbng' (happy/joyful) is good. 'kammavisuddhimattano' (his own pure action) as 's\u1ef1 thanh t\u1ecbnh c\u1ee7a qu\u1ea3 b\u00e1o ch\u00ednh m\u00ecnh' (the purity of his own retribution) is a reasonable interpretation, similar to item 15."}
entries.4345e01d4cde5af7: {"accuracy": 4, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "The translation is generally accurate. 'tappati' (suffers/is tormented) is translated as 'run r\u1ea9y' (trembles/shivers), which is a consequence of suffering rather than suffering itself, a slight shift in nuance. The rest is well translated."}
entries.7e717f3108c03b8a: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "This translation is perfectly accurate, conveying the meaning of delight and the positive outcome of good deeds with excellent fluency."}
entries.eea406dfd03792a4: {"accuracy": 1, "fluency": 3, "explanation": "This translation contains multiple major errors. 'sahita\u1e43 bh\u0101sam\u0101no' (reciting much scripture) is mistranslated as 'n\u00f3i chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi' (talking with many people). 'na takkaro hoti' (is not a doer of it) is omitted. The simile 'Gopova g\u0101vo ga\u1e47aya\u1e43 paresa\u1e43' (like a cowherd counting others' cows) is completely misinterpreted as 'Gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 con b\u00f2 kh\u00f4ng thu\u1ed9c \u0111\u00e0n' (like a cow not belonging to the herd)."}
entries.8f42df3c92a086fa: {"accuracy": 2, "fluency": 3, "explanation": "There's a major accuracy issue in the first phrase: 'Appampi ce sahita\u1e43 bh\u0101sam\u0101no' (though he recites little scripture) is again mistranslated as 'd\u00f9 n\u00f3i chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi' (though talking with many people). This misinterpretation makes the opening clause somewhat awkward in context. The rest of the translation is accurate."}
